event.title: October Meetup: Continuous Integration
event.description:
This month we're meeting at The Real Adventure to discuss all things Continuous Integration! We have 3 great speakers telling us about their CI setups:

• Matt Hamilton: Automated Feature Branch Builds for iOS

• James Bulmer, Operations Engineer at Crowdcube: Continuous Integration and Tooling: Lessons Learned

• Mike Rhodes: Building and testing a cross-platform Java library
